name: Cafe Maroc
description: Mexican burritos are usually made with a wheat tortilla and contain grilled meat, cheese toppings, and fresh vegetables which are sources of vitamins, proteins, fibers, minerals, and antioxidants. This makes burritos a balanced meal that can be enjoyed in moderation as part of a healthy meal plan.

reviews.comments: Great food, great service, great atmosphere!
